name: Nanali in another world
description:
Nanali in another world is an action puzzle where you have to think about two dimensions at once.

Each of the dimensions has its own dangers, and the main character of the game, Nanali, knows how to move among them. With this ability, you will have to find your way out of twisted levels full of scary and dangerous traps.

Game features: unique ability to travel in two worlds, puzzle, trains the brain, for the whole family, various abilities, music from vyuzhzhik.
